Dialog.LanguageChanged.Title: Language updated
Dialog.LanguageChanged.Body: Restart GMentor to see all texts in the new language.
Dialog.MissingKey.Title: Missing key
Dialog.MissingKey.Body:
You need an API key.
Go: File → Change Provider/Key…
Dialog.ProviderOverloaded.Title: AI Model Overloaded (503)
Dialog.ProviderOverloaded.Body:
Gemini is overloaded right now.

It’s not your key and not your request. The model is at capacity.
Dialog.RequestCanceled.Body:
The request was canceled or timed out.
Try the shortcut again.
Dialog.RateLimit.Title: Rate Limit (429)
Dialog.RateLimit.Body:
You've hit the usage limits for this model.

Action required:
• Switch to another Gemini model in File → Change Provider/Key…
• Or check your usage in Google AI Studio.
Dialog.RateLimit.Http.Body:
You’ve likely hit the free-tier per-minute or per-day cap.

Check your usage in Google AI Studio.
Dialog.AuthError.Title: Auth Error
Dialog.AuthError.Body:
Auth error from Gemini.

Double-check your API key in File → Change Provider/Key…
Dialog.Timeout.Title: Timeout
Dialog.Timeout.Body:
The AI didn’t respond in time.
Try the shortcut again from the same screen crop.
Dialog.AIError.Title: AI Error
Dialog.RequestError.Title: Request error
Dialog.RequestError.Body: The request failed. Double-check your key/model and try again.
Help.HowTo.Title: How to use GMentor
Help.HowTo.Body:
How to use GMentor
------------------
1) Open your game and go to the screen you want analyzed.
2) Press a shortcut and drag a box over that area:
   • Ctrl+Alt+Q – Quest / Mission
   • Ctrl+Alt+G – Gun / Mods
   • Ctrl+Alt+L – Loot / Item
   • Ctrl+Alt+K – Keys / Cards

Tip: If GMentor detects a supported game, shortcut names and actions adjust automatically. Check the “Shortcuts” bar after launching your game.

You can minimize GMentor — it keeps running in the tray and hotkeys stay active.
Help.Privacy.Title: Privacy
Help.Privacy.Body:
Privacy:

• Your API key stays on your PC (encrypted with Windows).
• GMentor never proxies your key or requests.
• Only the crop you select is sent straight to the AI provider.
Help.NoQuery.Title: No query
Help.NoQuery.Body: No tutorial query yet—run a request first.
Text.MiminizedMessage:
GMentor is running in the tray.
Use the shortcuts shown in the app to analyze.
Text.PrivacyNote: GMentor never sees your API key — it stays securely on your PC, and the data you send goes straight to the AI.
Setup.HeaderChip: We never see your key — calls go straight from your PC to Gemini.
Setup.RememberKey: Remember this key on this PC
